ANU.name: Denis J. Evans
expertise: Statistical Mechanics Physical Combinatorics And Mathematical Aspects Of Condensed Matter
ANU.biography: I have been a visiting professor at the Isaac Newton Institute for Mathematics at Cambridge UK, the Institute Henri Poincare University of Paris V FRance, the Nordic Institute for Mathematical Physics Stockholm Sweden and the Erwin Schrodinger Institute for Mathematical Physics in Vienna Austria.
